insert into mz_enumeration (thecode, createby, createtime, deleted, description, `name`, parentid, thekey, thevalue, displayno, `type`) values (#{thecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thekey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thevalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update mz_enumeration set thecode = #{thecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createby = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thekey = #{thekey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thevalue = #{thevalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, displayno = #{displayno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, thecode, createby, createtime, deleted, description, `name`, parentid, thekey, thevalue, displayno, `type` from mz_enumeration where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
